dc:title: DiGiorgio Struck Huelga! Join By Not Buying
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reports on the farm workers strike against the DiGeorgio corporation and lauds the non-violent social movement to give "birth to the new order, the new heaven and new earth in which justice dwelleth."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 841 1966-07-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
